entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
